title: Astræa
description: A quick jump home. A compromised ship. A desperate fight to save Earth’s future.Running short of supplies and hope, Kitt Ashton faces a stark choice. Abandon his ship and take shelter on an unregistered planet with his companion, or fight on, bleak though the future looks. Whatever the outcome, survival looks unlikely, but Ashton is still true to his oath and Royal Navy officers do not surrender willingly. With Earth about to face its greatest peril, will Ashton find himself taking the final option? A very British space adventure!
author: Leona Grace
